title: With the close of his Twitter deal, Elon Muskâ€™s geopolitical influence is set to grow.
dc:creator: Cade Metz, Adam Satariano and Chang Che
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A Starlink system in use in the Kharkiv region of Ukraine. The system, which can beam internet service to conflict zones and geopolitical hot spots, has become an essential tool of the Ukrainian army.
